short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download files with AB Download Manager app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can manage and organize your downloads with AB Download Manager App

Features
✔ Adds "Download With AB DM" to the Browser Context Menu
✔ Shows popup when links are selected, allowing to download them by the App
✔ Automatically captures Download Links and send them to the AB Download Manager app

NOTE: This extension ONLY works when you have installed AB Download Manager app on your device.
You can install it using
Installation link: https://abdownloadmanager.com/#download

This Extension is Free and Open Source
Link in GitHub: https://github.com/amir1376/ab-download-manager-browser-integration
The App is also is Free And Open Source
Link in GitHub: https://github.com/amir1376/ab-download-manager
